name: llm-gateway-main
description: An intelligent gateway for routing requests to LLM providers.

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "pnpm -w -F server run dev" "pnpm -w -F ui run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -w -F server run build && pnpm -w -F ui run build
scripts.clean: pnpm -w -F server run clean && rm -rf ui/dist
scripts.setup: cp config.example.jsonc config.jsonc && echo 'Configuration file created. Please edit config.jsonc with your API keys.'
